name: @soundws/audio-tools-lambda-layer
description: Static build of FFmpeg/FFprobe, Sox & Lame for Amazon Linux 2, packaged as a Lambda layer.
author: The First Coders Team (https://www.firstcoders.co.uk)

scripts.sam:publish: sam package --output-template-file packaged.yaml --s3-bucket $AWS_SAM_PACKAGE_BUCKET_NAME --region ${AWS_REGION:=us-east-1} && sam publish --template packaged.yaml --region ${AWS_REGION:=us-east-1} --semantic-version $npm_package_version
